meanings.sent1: She felt very successful after completing her project on time.
meanings.sent2: The team's hard work led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent3: The successful student proudly displayed her top grade on the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her successful journey to the top of the mountain was filled with challenges.
meanings.sent5: The successful completion of the puzzle brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: Having achieved fame, wealth, or social status.
meanings.sent1: The actor became successful after starring in a hit movie.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of becoming successful in their careers.
meanings.sent3: The successful entrepreneur decided to invest in a new business venture.
meanings.sent4: Her successful rise to the top of the company was admired by her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The successful singer's concert was sold out within minutes.
